events.title: Rosa Parks Arrested
events.description: Rosa Parks is arrested after refusing to give up her seat on a segregated Montgomery bus.

events.title: Boycott Begins
events.description: The Montgomery Bus Boycott officially begins and local leaders organize sustained action.

events.title: Indictments Against Boycott Leaders
events.description: Dozens of leaders, including Martin Luther King Jr., are indicted under anti-boycott laws.

events.title: Integrated Buses in Montgomery
events.description: After federal rulings, Montgomery's buses are integrated and the boycott ends.
